thread.title: Transfer news: Liberty captain Alfred Nelson joins Kuwaiti side Al Yarmouk
thread.title_full: Transfer news: Liberty captain Alfred Nelson joins Kuwaiti side Al Yarmouk

title: Transfer news: Liberty captain Alfred Nelson joins Kuwaiti side Al Yarmouk
text:
13:41 CET Transfer news: Liberty captain Alfred Nelson joins Kuwaiti side Al Yarmouk - www.allsports.com.gh 
Liberty Professionals captain, Alfred Nelson has joined Kuwaiti top-flight side Al Yarmouk on loan from Ghana premier league side, Allsports.com.gh can confirm. 
The 23 year old guardsman has been one of the influential players of the Dansoman based club since joining the 'Scientific Soccer lads' 4 seasons ago from Unistar Academy. 
Alfred Neslon last season helped Liberty Professionals to finish the season at the 5th position which also earned him a call up into the local Black Stars team coached by Maxwell Konadu. 
Due to his performance in the Ghana premier league, the Mishref based club in their quest to build a formidable team have secured the signature of Alfred Nelson who signed a year deal. 
Al Yarmouk last season in the Kuwaiti league placed 10th. 
For more sports news visit allSports.com.gh
